mapper.insert: /* intrTempProc10101010 : 템플릿 등록 처리 */ INSERT INTO INTR_TEMPLATE ( TEMPLATE_CD , TEMPLATE_NM , TEMPLATE_CONTENT , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER , REMARK ) VALUES ( (SELECT 'TEMP_' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(TEMPLATE_CD,LENGTH(TEMPLATE_CD)-3,LENGTH(TEMPLATE_CD))),0) + 1,4,0) AS TEMPLATE_CD FROM INTR_TEMPLATE) , #{templateNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{templateContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DISP_ORDER),0) + 1 FROM INTR_TEMPLATE ) , NULL )
